title: Regulation (EEC) No 1381/70 of the Commission of 14 July 1970 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1470/68 as regards determining the oil content of oil seeds offered for intervention
header:
REGULATION (EEC) No 1381/70 OF THE COMMISSION  of 14 July 1970  amending Regulation (EEC) No 1470/68 as regards determining the oil content of oil seeds offered for intervention
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 14 July 1970.
For the Commission
The President
Franco M. MALFATTI  (1)OJ No 172, 30.9.1966, p. 3025/66. (2)OJ No L 143, 1.7.1970, p. 1. (3)OJ No L 239, 28.9.1968, p. 2. (4)OJ No L 226, 6.9.1969, p. 22.
